about_the_game:
Embark on a Royal Journey:
Step into the shoes of a mighty monarch in this captivating Kingdom Simulator. Your adventure centers on the thrilling conquest of new lands and the pursuit of dominance in a medieval world. As the ruler of your realm, it's your responsibility to shape the destiny of your kingdom. The choices you make will determine whether you're remembered as a wise and just ruler or one whose name strikes fear into the hearts of enemies.

Lead Armies and Conquer Lands:
Take charge of your armies and explore uncharted territories. Engage in exhilarating battles, where your strategic prowess and cunning tactics are your greatest assets. Whether you aim to expand your realm or protect it from invaders, the fate of your kingdom rests on your battlefield decisions. Will your reign be marked by victorious conquests and glorious victories, or will you face the challenges of defending your lands?



Master the Art of Kingdom Management:
Learn the art of kingdom management as you oversee resource allocation, construction projects, and the growth of a thriving economy. Strategic decisions in taxation and trade are key to ensuring your realm's prosperity. As you balance the needs and desires of your subjects, you'll witness your kingdom flourish under your rule. Can you successfully manage your resources to create a thriving medieval society?

Adapt to the Seasons:
Experience the dynamic impact of changing seasons on your kingdom. Adapt your strategies to leverage the unique advantages each season offers. From the abundance of summer harvests to the challenges of surviving winter's treacherous blizzards, each season presents new opportunities and obstacles. Will you thrive year-round by mastering the seasons, or will your kingdom falter under their weight?



Navigate Diplomacy and Intrigue:
Dive into the intricate world of diplomacy as you build alliances, negotiate treaties, and engage in political maneuvering. Strengthen your kingdom by forming strategic partnerships with neighboring realms. However, be vigilant, for not all rulers are trustworthy. You'll face conflicts and tests of your leadership as you strive to secure your kingdom's prosperity and expand its borders. Can you skillfully navigate the complex web of diplomacy?

Unfold Captivating Narratives:
Immerse yourself in captivating narratives as you interact with a diverse cast of characters. Each character harbors their own ambitions, dreams, and secrets. Your choices and actions will have far-reaching consequences, affecting the course of your kingdom and the lives of those who inhabit it. Will your diplomacy skills lead to enduring alliances or unforeseen challenges? The tapestry of these intricate narratives awaits your exploration.

content_descriptors.notes: Violence in form of armies battling and criminal acts of theft and protests/riots.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5‑10505 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 1030 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7‑10610U / AMD Ryzen 7 4800H
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 1030 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Build, rule, and conquer in this immersive Kingdom Simulator. Shape your medieval realm, manage resources, navigate challenges, and strategize for the prosperity of your kingdom. Will you be a benevolent monarch or a cunning conqueror?
